text.0: o indra drink the soma juice with Ṛtu let the cheering drops.
text.1: sink deep within which settle there.
text.2: drink from the purifiers cup maruts with Ṛtu sanctify.
text.3: the rite for ye give precious gifts.
text.4: o neṣṭar with thy dame accept our sacrifice with Ṛtu drink.
text.5: for thou art he who giveth wealth.
text.6: bring the gods agni in the three appointed places set them down.
text.7: surround them and with Ṛtu drink.
text.8: drink soma after the Ṛtus from the brāhmaṇas bounty undissolved.
text.9: o indra is thy friendships bond.
text.10: mitra varuṇa ye whose ways are firma power that none deceives.
text.11: with Ṛtu ye have reached the rite.
text.12: the somapressers fain for wealth praise the wealthgiver in the rite.
text.14: may the wealthgiver grant to us riches that shall be far renowned.
text.15: these things we gain among the gods.
text.16: he with the Ṛtu fain would drink wealthgiver from the neṣṭars bowl.
text.17: haste give your offering and depart.
text.18: as we this fourth time wealthgiver honour thee with the Ṛtus be.
text.20: drink ye the meath o aśvins bright with flames whose acts are pure who with.
text.22: with Ṛtu through the housefire thou kind giver guidest sacrifice.
text.23: worship the gods for the pious man.
